description:
A master thief called More Peach Summer has threatened to steal a painting from Momoka`s father!  Can Fuyuki outwit the thief, and does the thief have a familiar identity?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les demoiselles cambrioleuses / Le grand combat sous-marin
Take Another Little Piece of My Art Now Baby!
桃華 & 夏美 & モア怪盗モアピーチサマー であります / ケロロ 必勝! 水中大決戦 であります
